artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 478.13; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), fig. 232, p. 277.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: one sheet; human figure with a fox's head, looking back over PL shoulder; string of blue beads and green bamboo staff held in hands; grey, white with grey flowers and turquoise garments; dry tall grasses at left and right; night sky with crescent moon
markings: Artist’s seal: 芳年 {Yoshitoshi} | Carver’s seal: 彫工円治刀 {horikō Enkatsu}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One Hundred Aspects of the Moon (Tsuki hyakushi 月百姿)
title: The Cry of the Fox
